name: Steam and Silk
description:
In this city-building game, you are task with building the greatest steampunk cities the world has ever seen!

The fate of the people and their coming generations rests on your shoulders.Strategic City BuildingYour people wants more than just a home and food. In time they will demand more non essential commodities like pottery, furnitures and spices.Campaign and Skirmish ModeCampaign mode offers an increasingly challenging experience. Skirmish mode allows a great amount of customization options like starting conditions and world generating seeds.
